item.title: 哥伦比亚立法者阻止增税，财政前景扑朔迷离
item.description: 哥伦比亚国会否决了总统古斯塔沃-彼得罗（Gustavo Petro）的增税提案，为该国日益恶化的财政前景增添了新的不确定性。【原文：Colombia’s congress rejected President Gustavo Petro’s proposed tax increases, adding new uncertainty to the country’s worsening fiscal outlook.】

item.title: 卢拉请求特朗普帮助逮捕巴西 "最大债主
item.description: 路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）总统对美国总统说，唐纳德-特朗普可以通过逮捕被指控为南美最大逃税者的佛罗里达州居民来帮助巴西打击有组织犯罪。【原文：Donald Trump could help Brazil fight organized crime by arresting the Florida resident accused of being the South American country’s biggest tax evader, President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva told his US counterpart.】

item.title: 法国立法者支持支出部分社会保障预算
item.description: 法国国民议会在周二进行的两次投票中首次通过了社会保障法案的支出部分，这对总理塞巴斯蒂安-勒科努试图实现国家财政稳定至关重要。【原文：France’s National Assembly adopted the spending part of the social security bill in the first of two votes on Tuesday that are crucial to Prime Minister Sebastien Lecornu’s attempt to bring fiscal stability to the country.】

item.title: 泰森牛肉工厂关闭后，美国农业部下调牛价展望
item.description: 由于泰森食品公司（Tyson Foods Inc.【原文：Cattle prices won’t rise as much as previously expected in 2026, as the closure of a Tyson Foods Inc. plant is seen loosening competition for scarce US supplies.】

item.title: 智利博里奇提名凯文-考恩为中央银行董事会成员
item.description: 智利总统加布里埃尔-博里奇（Gabriel Boric）提名凯文-考恩（Kevin Cowan）为央行董事会成员，因为投资者押注决策者将在明年初尽快使通胀率达到目标。【原文：Chile President Gabriel Boric nominated Kevin Cowan to the central bank board as investors bet that policymakers will bring inflation to target as soon as early next year.】

item.title: 凯雷首席财务官对筹资持乐观态度，预计收费将有更多增长
item.description: 凯雷集团（Carlyle Group Inc.首席财务官约翰-雷德特（John Redett）在准备接任联席总裁并领导私募股权投资业务时，对该公司的发展前景和筹资前景进行了吹捧。【原文：Carlyle Group Inc. Chief Financial Officer John Redett touted the firm’s growth prospects and outlook on fundraising as he prepares to take over as co-president and lead its private equity business.】

item.title: 霍华德-马克斯称人工智能对就业 "可怕"，并质疑债务成本
item.description: 橡树资本管理公司（Oaktree Capital Management LP）联合创始人霍华德-马克斯（Howard Marks）警告说，人工智能为就业带来了 "可怕的 "前景，而假定的生产力繁荣并没有考虑到有多少人能够负担得起额外生产的商品。【原文：Artificial intelligence has created a “terrifying” outlook for employment, Oaktree Capital Management LP co-founder Howard Marks cautioned, and an assumed productivity boom fails to consider how many people will be able to afford the additional goods produced.】

item.title: 贝莱德将投资亿万富翁贝拉的绿色能源公司
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.【原文：An infrastructure unit of BlackRock Inc. will invest as much as $335 million in the renewable energy holding company of the Aditya Birla Group, as the Indian conglomerate joins rivals in a race to boost its clean power output.】

item.title: 卢拉所在政党支持央行行长，尽管利率居高不下
item.description: 巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）的政党领袖表示支持央行行长加布里埃尔-加里波洛（Gabriel Galipolo），尽管高利率有可能在明年大选前拖累经济。【原文：The head of Brazil President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva’s political party expressed support for central bank chief Gabriel Galipolo, even as high interest rates threaten to drag on the economy ahead of next year’s election.】

item.title: 宝马新首席执行官早早押注英伟达，以在工厂设置方面取得领先地位
item.description: 2021 年，早在人工智能成为企业热词之前，宝马汽车公司的生产主管米兰-内德利科维奇（Milan Nedeljkovic）就打赌要利用 Nvidia 公司的技术来虚拟规划未来的工厂。【原文：In 2021, well before AI became a corporate buzzword, BMW AG’s production chief Milan Nedeljkovic made a bet on using Nvidia Corp.’s technology to virtually plan future factories.】

item.title: 美国农业部认为美国大豆出口持平，大豆价格维持在 11 美元以下
item.description: 美国农业部在月度报告中预测美国供应持平，世界产量略有增加，大豆期货维持跌势。【原文：Soybean futures maintained losses after the US Department of Agriculture in a monthly report predicted flat US supplies and slightly larger world output.】

item.title: 绿党投弃权票，法国福利预算提案获支持
item.description: 法国国民议会绿党议员将在关于社会保障预算的关键投票中投弃权票，这增加了总理塞巴斯蒂安-勒科尔努避免政府危机的可能性。【原文：French lawmakers in the Green group at the National Assembly will abstain in a crucial vote on the social security budget, increasing the likelihood Prime Minister Sebastien Lecornu can avoid a government crisis.】

item.title: 英国零售业大亨迈克-阿什利以 Frasers 股票抵押贷款
item.description: 据周二的一份文件显示，亿万富翁迈克-阿什利（Mike Ashley）以其英国零售商 Frasers Group Plc 价值超过 6 亿英镑（约合 8 亿美元）的股票作为抵押，向汇丰控股公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）申请贷款。【原文：Billionaire Mike Ashley put up shares worth more than £600 million ($800 million) in his UK retailer Frasers Group Plc against a loan with HSBC Holdings Plc, according to a filing on Tuesday.】

item.title: 摩根大通寻求将 8.4 亿美元的小额基金转化为 ETF
item.description: 摩根大通资产管理公司（JPMorgan Asset Management）正寻求在 2026 年将两只资产超过 8.4 亿美元的市政债券共同基金转换为交易所交易基金（ETF），这凸显了这种产品越来越受欢迎。【原文：JPMorgan Asset Management is seeking to convert two municipal-bond mutual funds with over $840 million of assets into ETFs in 2026, underscoring the growing popularity of the products.】

item.title: 埃克森首席财务官凯西-米克尔斯因健康状况将于 2 月 1 日退休
item.description: 凯西-米克尔斯（Kathy Mikells）是第一位加入埃克森美孚公司高层核心圈的外部人士，她将于明年退休，因为她正在与严重但无生命危险的健康状况作斗争。【原文：Kathy Mikells, the first outsider to join Exxon Mobil Corp.’s inner circle of top executives, will retire next year as she battles a serious but non-life threatening health condition.】

item.title: 英格兰银行官员称需要裁员来修正预测
item.description: 负责英格兰银行现代化工作的官员表示，英格兰银行需要裁员，以改进预测，并加大对过时的技术基础设施的投资。【原文：The Bank of England needs to cut jobs in order to improve its forecasts and ramp up investment in outdated technology infrastructure, according to the official in charge of its modernization efforts.】

item.title: 纽约市拥堵费使收费区污染减少 22
item.description: 康奈尔大学的一项分析显示，在驾车者开始支付新的通行费后，曼哈顿部分地区的污染在今年上半年下降了 22%。【原文：Pollution in parts of Manhattan declined by 22% in the first six months of this year after motorists began paying a new toll to drive south of 60th Street, according to a Cornell University analysis.】

item.title: 摩根大通押注波士顿，计划在新大厦上印上摩根大通的名字
item.description: 摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co.）计划将其波士顿办事处迁至新的南站大厦（South Station Tower），并加入在这座城市的天际线上留下自己名字的稀有公司行列。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. plans to move its Boston offices to the new South Station Tower — and join the rarefied ranks of companies that have stamped their names on the city’s skyline.】

item.title: 就业数据引发国债反弹停滞 拍卖在即
item.description: 国债走低，此前一项美国职位空缺指数高于预期，这凸显了美联储决策者在准备就本周是否再次降息进行投票时所面临的挑战。【原文：Treasuries edged lower after a gauge of US job openings topped estimates, highlighting the challenge Federal Reserve policymakers face as they prepare to vote on whether to lower interest rates again this week.】

item.title: 乌克兰就债券互换条款与认股权证持有人达成协议
item.description: 乌克兰和一批投资者就该国提出的将其与国内生产总值挂钩的证券换成新一类债券的建议达成了协议，从而结束了数月来有关该证券的谈判。【原文：Ukraine and a group of investors have reached an agreement on the country’s proposal to swap its GDP-linked securities into a new class of bonds, concluding months of negotiations over the securities.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长帕内塔认为美元不再是全球主要货币
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员法比奥-帕内塔表示，国际货币体系很可能会从美元转向由几种共存的全球货币组成的星座。【原文：The international monetary system will likely move away from the dollar to a constellation of several coexisting global currencies, according to European Central Bank Governing Council member Fabio Panetta.】

item.title: 人工智能热潮正在吞噬一切
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 巴西市场低迷，政治动荡打击对冲基金交易
item.description: 随着巴西市场月复一月地反弹，全球投资者不断涌入，其涨幅之大足以掩盖离总统选举还有近一年时间的风险。【原文：As Brazil’s markets rallied, month after month, and global investors kept flooding in, the gains were big enough to overshadow the risks from a presidential election that’s still almost a year away.】

item.title: 波音公司 777X 订购热潮扩大对空客的领先优势
item.description: 波音公司在 11 月份获得了 164 架飞机的订单，其中近一半是大型 777X 喷气式客机，从而扩大了其在销售额上对欧洲竞争对手空中客车公司的领先优势。【原文：Boeing Co. booked 164 gross airplane orders in November, with almost half of those for the hulking 777X jetliners, to extend its sales lead over reeling European rival Airbus SE.】

item.title: 英国央行预计英国预算案将把通胀率降低半个百分点
item.description: 英格兰银行预计英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）的预算案将使英国明年春季的通胀率降低多达半个百分点，即使政府在未来几年增加支出也是如此。【原文：The Bank of England expects Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves’ budget to reduce UK inflation by as much as half a percentage point next spring, even as the government boost spending over the coming years.】

item.title: 交易商押注利率下调，现货白银突破 60 美元纪录
item.description: 白银反弹至每盎司 60 美元以上的新纪录，因为交易商押注美联储将进一步放宽货币政策和供应持续紧张。【原文：Silver rallied to a fresh record above $60 an ounce, as traders bet further monetary easing by the Federal Reserve and continued supply tightness.】

item.title: 全球最大的航空餐饮公司 Gategroup 据称已为首次公开募股做好准备
item.description: 据知情人士透露，全球最大的机上餐饮公司 Gategroup Holding AG 正准备在明年下半年进行首次公开募股。【原文：The world’s biggest in-flight caterer Gategroup Holding AG is preparing for an initial public offering as soon as the second half of next year, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 汇丰退出海湾地区促使该行从英国引入交易员
item.description: 汇丰控股有限公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）已将几位董事总经理从伦敦调往中东，以补充其在该地区的人员，该地区被指定为首席执行官乔治-埃尔德里（Georges Elhedery）的工作重点。【原文：HSBC Holdings Plc has relocated several managing directors from London to the Middle East, replenishing its ranks in a region earmarked as a priority under Chief Executive Officer Georges Elhedery.】

item.title: 哈塞特称美联储现在有空间削减超过 25 个基点的货币
item.description: 白宫国家经济委员会主任凯文-哈塞特（Kevin Hassett）表示，他认为大幅下调美联储基准利率的空间很大。【原文：White House National Economic Council Director Kevin Hassett said he sees plenty of room to substantially lower the Federal Reserve’s benchmark interest rate.】

item.title: 加密货币的流动性引擎随着 50 亿美元 ETF 的出逃而崩溃
item.description: 比特币正努力将近期的好消息转化为实质性的反弹，这凸显了数字资产市场的持续疲软和流动性稀缺，这在抑制价格方面起到了一定的作用。【原文：Bitcoin is struggling to turn recent good news into a substantive rebound, highlighting the ongoing weakness and thin liquidity in digital asset markets that have played a role in keeping prices subdued.】
